long_description: Keep hungry insects at bay and out of your face with the Outdoor Research(R) Bug Bucket hat! Attached to the brim, no-see-um mesh offers 360deg of coverage to keep out bugs; drawcord secures mesh around your neck. When not needed, store the netting by rolling it above the brim, or secure it under the crown. Hidden pocket in crown is perfect for ID and other small necessities; hat can store within pocket for easy packing. dri-release(R) headband wicks moisture away, keeping you comfortable in heat and humidity or when you're working up a sweat. Hat gives you more than just bug protection, as SolarShield(TM) material provides UPF +30 protection against harmful solar rays.
short_description: Keep hungry insects at bay and out of your face with the Outdoor Research(R) Bug Bucket hat!
